public ref class Matrix sealed : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable
type Matrix = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IDisposable

summary.span: 封装表示几何变换的 3x3 仿射矩阵。

span.span: Encapsulates a 3-by-3 affine matrix that represents a geometric transform.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]可以存储在一个仿射转换对象。In [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] you can store an affine transformation in a object. 因为表示仿射转换矩阵的第三个列始终为 （0，0，1） 中的前两个列中指定仅六个数字，在构造时对象。Because the third column of a matrix that represents an affine transformation is always (0, 0, 1), you specify only the six numbers in the first two columns when you construct a object. 该语句`Matrix myMatrix = new Matrix(0, 1, -1, 0, 3, 4)`构造在下图中所示的矩阵。The statement `Matrix myMatrix = new Matrix(0, 1, -1, 0, 3, 4)` constructs the matrix shown in the following figure. ![转换](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art10.gif "转换")![Transformations](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art10.gif "Transformations") ## 复合转换Composite Transformations 复合转换是一系列转换后, 跟另一个。A composite transformation is a sequence of transformations, one followed by the other. 请考虑矩阵和在下面的列表中的转换：Consider the matrices and transformations in the following list: ||| |-|-| |矩阵 AMatrix A|旋转 90 度Rotate 90 degrees| |矩阵 BMatrix B|通过沿 x 方向的 2 倍缩放Scale by a factor of 2 in the x direction| |矩阵 CMatrix C|转换在 y 方向的 3 个单位Translate 3 units in the y direction| 如果我们使用点 （2，1）-由矩阵 [2 1 1] 表示 — 乘以 A、 B、，然后 C，（2，1） 的点将进行按所列顺序的三个转换。If we start with the point (2, 1) — represented by the matrix [2 1 1] — and multiply by A, then B, then C, the point (2, 1) will undergo the three transformations in the order listed. [2 1 1]ABC = [-2 5 1][2 1 1]ABC = [-2 5 1] 而是不是存储在三个单独的矩阵复合转换的三个部分，您可以乘以 A、 B 和 C 一起以获取存储整个复合转换的一个 3 × 3 矩阵。Rather than store the three parts of the composite transformation in three separate matrices, you can multiply A, B, and C together to get a single 3×3 matrix that stores the entire composite transformation. 假设 ABC = d。然后，乘以 D 的点提供相同的结果为点乘以 A、 B，然后按 c。Suppose ABC = D. Then a point multiplied by D gives the same result as a point multiplied by A, then B, then C. [2 1 1]D = [-2 5 1][2 1 1]D = [-2 5 1] 下图显示了矩阵 A、 B、 C 和 d。The following illustration shows the matrices A, B, C, and D. ![转换](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art12.gif "转换")![Transformations](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art12.gif "Transformations") 复合转换的矩阵，可以通过将单独的变换矩阵相乘格式正确的事实意味着仿射转换任何序列可以存储在单个对象。The fact that the matrix of a composite transformation can be formed by multiplying the individual transformation matrices means that any sequence of affine transformations can be stored in a single object. > [!CAUTION] > 复合转换的顺序非常重要。The order of a composite transformation is important. 一般情况下，旋转，然后扩展，然后转换是不相同的小数位数为然后旋转，然后转换。In general, rotate, then scale, then translate is not the same as scale, then rotate, then translate. 同样，矩阵乘法的顺序非常重要。Similarly, the order of matrix multiplication is important. 一般情况下，ABC 不与备份相同。In general, ABC is not the same as BAC. 类提供用于构建复合转换的多种方法： ， ， ， ， ，和。The class provides several methods for building a composite transformation: , , , , , and . 下面的示例创建一个复合转换，它先旋转 30 度，然后按 2 在 y 方向中的因子缩放，然后会在 x 方向的 5 个单位将转换的矩阵。The following example creates the matrix of a composite transformation that first rotates 30 degrees, then scales by a factor of 2 in the y direction, and then translates 5 units in the x direction: [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.CoordinateSystems#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CoordinateSystems/CS/Class1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.CoordinateSystems#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CoordinateSystems/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

span.span: Coordinate Systems and Transformations

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle rect, valuetype System.Drawing.Point[] plgpts) cil managed
Public Sub New (rect As Rectangle, plgpts As Point())

param.name: rect
param.span: 表示将转换的矩形的 结构。

span.span: A structure that represents the rectangle to be transformed.

param.name: plgpts
param.span: 一个由三个 结构构成的数组，该数组表示矩形的左上角、右上角和左下角将转换为的平行四边形的三个点。

span.span: An array of three structures that represents the points of a parallelogram to which the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the rectangle is to be transformed.

param.span: 平行四边形的右下角的位置可从前三个角的位置导出。

span.span: The lower-right corner of the parallelogram is implied by the first three corners.

summary.span: 将 类的一个新实例初始化为指定矩形和点数组定义的几何转换。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to the geometric transform defined by the specified rectangle and array of points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法初始化新的矩阵，这样它表示映射指定的矩形的几何转换`rect`参数中的三个点定义的平行四边形`plgpts`参数。This method initializes the new Matrix such that it represents the geometric transform that maps the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter to the parallelogram defined by the three points in the `plgpts` parameter. 矩形的左上角映射到的第一个点`plgpts`数组，右上角映射到第二个点，并在左下角映射到第三个点。The upper-left corner of the rectangle is mapped to the first point in the `plgpts` array, the upper-right corner is mapped to the second point, and the lower-left corner is mapped to the third point. 前三个被隐含的平行四边形的右下角点。The lower-right point of the parallelogram is implied by the first three.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法初始化新这样它表示由指定的矩形映射的几何变换`rect`参数中的三个点定义的平行四边形`plgpts`参数。This method initializes the new such that it represents the geometric transform that maps the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter to the parallelogram defined by the three points in the `plgpts` parameter. 矩形的左上角映射到的第一个点`plgpts`数组，右上角映射到第二个点，并在左下角映射到第三个点。The upper-left corner of the rectangle is mapped to the first point in the `plgpts` array, the upper-right corner is mapped to the second point, and the lower-left corner is mapped to the third point. 前三个被隐含的平行四边形的右下角点。The lower-right point of the parallelogram is implied by the first three.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的顺序，则此预先计算的顺序中指定的矩阵的乘积。If the specified order is , this is multiplied by the specified matrix in a prepended order. 如果指定的顺序，则此追加的顺序指定的矩阵的乘积。If the specified order is , this is multiplied by the specified matrix in an appended order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建三个矩阵。Creates three matrices. - 列出了在屏幕上的矩阵 1 的内容。Lists the contents of matrix 1 to the screen. - 将矩阵 1 x 2 矩阵相乘并将结果存储在矩阵 1。Multiplies matrix 1 by matrix 2 and stores the result in matrix 1. - 列出了在屏幕上的矩阵 1 的内容。Lists the contents of matrix 1 to the screen. - 将结果存储在通过矩阵 3，1 矩阵相乘并将结果再次存储在矩阵 1。Multiplies the result stored in matrix 1 by matrix 3, and again stores the result in matrix 1. - 列出了在屏幕上的矩阵 1 的内容。Lists the contents of matrix 1 to the screen. - 在应用矩阵 1 转换 （蓝色矩形） 之前在屏幕上绘制一个矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying the matrix 1 transform (the blue rectangle). - 向该矩形应用转换。Applies the transform to the rectangle. - 绘制到屏幕 （红色矩形），与上一个矩形使用相同的坐标的转换的矩形。Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle), using the same coordinates as the previous rectangle. 请注意，在水平方向，两个比例的缩放的红色矩形然后旋转 90 度，然后在 y 方向移动 （转换） 的 250 点沿 x 方向、 50 磅。Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of two in the horizontal direction, then rotated 90 degrees, and then moved (translated) 250 points in the x direction and 50 points in the y direction. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 重置此 得到单位矩阵的元素。

span.span: Resets this to have the elements of the identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 恒等矩阵主对角线上的元素是 1。The elements on the main diagonal of the identity matrix are 1. 标识矩阵的所有其他元素都是 0。All other elements of the identity matrix are 0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建缩放矩阵。Creates a scaling matrix. - 列出了在屏幕上的矩阵元素。Lists the matrix elements to the screen. - 将矩阵重置为标识。Resets the matrix to identity. - 列出了在屏幕上的元素。Lists the elements to the screen. - 将矩阵转换为 50 点沿 x 轴和 y 轴中的 40 点。Translates the matrix by 50 points in the x-axis and 40 points in the y-axis. - 列出了在屏幕上的已转换矩阵的元素。Lists the elements of the translated matrix to the screen. - 在应用的矩阵转换 （蓝色矩形） 之前在屏幕上绘制一个矩形绘制。Draws a rectangle is drawn to the screen prior to applying the matrix transform (the blue rectangle). - 向该矩形应用转换。Applies the transform to the rectangle. - 已转换的矩形绘制到屏幕 （红色矩形），使用相同的坐标为上一个矩形绘制。Draws the transformed rectangle is drawn to the screen (the red rectangle), using the same coordinates as the previous rectangle. 请注意，红色矩形是未缩放的 （由于重置），但已转换在 x 轴和 y 轴中。Notice that the red rectangle was not scaled (because of the reset) but was translated in the x-axis and y-axis. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

param.name: order

span.span: A that specifies the order (append or prepend) in which the rotation is applied to this .

summary.span: 按照 参数中指定的顺时针旋转量，对此 沿原点（X 和 Y 坐标为零处）旋转。

span.span: Applies a clockwise rotation of an amount specified in the parameter, around the origin (zero x and y coordinates) for this .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 在应用旋转转换 （蓝色矩形） 之前在屏幕上绘制一个矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a rotation transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵，并将其旋转 45 度。Creates a matrix and rotates it 45 degrees. - 将此矩阵转换应用到该矩形。Applies this matrix transform to the rectangle. - 将已转换的矩形绘制到屏幕 （红色矩形）。Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意，已旋转的红色矩形围绕 0，0 屏幕坐标。Notice that the red rectangle has been rotated around the 0, 0 screen coordinates. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 通过预先计算旋转，沿指定点顺时针旋转该 。

span.span: Applies a clockwise rotation about the specified point to this by prepending the rotation.

public: void RotateAt(float angle, System::Drawing::PointF point);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: angle
param.span: 旋转角度（范围）（单位：度）。

span.span: The angle (extent) of the rotation, in degrees.

param.name: point
param.span: 一个 ，表示旋转中心。

span.span: A that represents the center of the rotation.

summary.span: 沿 参数中指定的点并通过预先计算该旋转，来顺时针旋转此 。

span.span: Applies a clockwise rotation to this around the point specified in the parameter, and by prepending the rotation.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用和旋转一个字符串的方法。The following code example demonstrates using a and the method to rotate a string. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个窗体并将以下代码粘贴到其中。Create a form and paste the following code into it. 调用`DrawVerticalStringFromBottomUp`在该窗体事件处理程序，并传递`e`作为。Call the `DrawVerticalStringFromBottomUp` method in the form's event handler, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 在应用旋转转换 （蓝色矩形） 之前在屏幕上绘制一个矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a rotation transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵，并将其旋转 45 度围绕指定点。Creates a matrix and rotates it 45 degrees around a specified point. - 应用此矩阵转换是向该矩形。Applies this matrix transform is to the rectangle. - 将已转换的矩形绘制到屏幕 （红色矩形）。Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意，已周围的矩形的左上角旋转的红色矩形 (指定的旋转点方法)。Notice that the red rectangle has been rotated around the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the rotation point specified the method). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 在应用缩放转换 （蓝色矩形） 之前在屏幕上绘制一个矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a scaling transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵并增加 3 沿 x 轴和 y 轴中的 2。Creates a matrix and scales it by 3 in the x-axis and 2 in the y-axis. - 将此矩阵转换应用到该矩形。Applies this matrix transform to the rectangle. - 将已转换的矩形绘制到屏幕 （红色矩形）。Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意，红色矩形在原来的 3 x 轴和 y 轴，包括矩形 （矩形的起始点） 的左上角中的 2 已调整大小。Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of 3 in the x-axis and by 2 in the y-axis, including the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the beginning point of the rectangle). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 通过预先计算切变向量将指定的切变向量应用到此 。

span.span: Applies the specified shear vector to this by prepending the shear vector.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Shear (float shearX, float shearY);
.method public hidebysig instance void Shear(float32 shearX, float32 shearY) cil managed
Public Sub Shear (shearX As Single, shearY As Single)
public: void Shear(float shearX, float shearY);

param.name: shearX
param.span: 水平切变因子。

span.span: The horizontal shear factor.

param.name: shearY
param.span: 垂直切变因子。

span.span: The vertical shear factor.

summary.span: 通过预先计算切变转换，将指定的切变向量应用到此 。

span.span: Applies the specified shear vector to this by prepending the shear transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法中应用的转换是纯切变，仅当其中一个参数为 0。The transformation applied in this method is a pure shear only if one of the parameters is 0. 应用于原点，矩形时`shearY`因子为 0 时，转换将通过水平移动的下边缘`shearX`倍的矩形的高度。Applied to a rectangle at the origin, when the `shearY` factor is 0, the transformation moves the bottom edge horizontally by `shearX` times the height of the rectangle. 当`shearX`身份为 0，则它将移动右边缘的垂直`shearY`倍的矩形的宽度。When the `shearX` factor is 0, it moves the right edge vertically by `shearY` times the width of the rectangle. 当两个参数都为非零，因为结果难以预测时，警告是按顺序。Caution is in order when both parameters are nonzero, because the results are hard to predict. 例如，如果这两个因素都是 1，将转换为单数形式 (因此不可逆)，将为单个行的整个平面挤压。For example, if both factors are 1, the transformation is singular (hence noninvertible), squeezing the entire plane to a single line. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following action: - 将矩形绘制到屏幕上，使用绿色笔，然后将应用缩放转换。Draws a rectangle to the screen, using a green pen, prior to applying a scaling transform. - 创建并使用它来设置世界坐标转换为。Creates a and uses it to set a world-coordinate transform for the . - 绘制使用红色笔的另一个矩形。Draws another rectangle using a red pen. - 绘制一个椭圆使用蓝色的笔。Draws an ellipse using a blue pen. 结果是绿色矩形、 红色的平行四边形和转换后的蓝色椭圆。The result is a green rectangle, a red parallelogram and a transformed, blue ellipse. 请注意，绿色矩形 （绘制在将该转换之前） 直接使用中提供的坐标调用。Notice that the green rectangle (drawn prior to setting the transform) directly uses the coordinates supplied in the call. 在绘制之前进行转换的其他两个图。The other two figures are transformed prior to drawing. 转换为 （红色）、 一个平行四边形的矩形和椭圆 （蓝色） 进行转换，以容纳转换后的平行四边形。The rectangle is transformed to a parallelogram (red), and the ellipse (blue) is transformed to fit into the transformed parallelogram. 请注意底部的矩形移动 （切变） 的距离沿 x 轴到原来的两次而形成的平行四边形的矩形的高度。Notice the bottom of the rectangle is moved (sheared) in the x-axis by a factor of two times the height of the rectangle, thus forming the parallelogram. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

span.span: A that specifies the order (append or prepend) in which the shear is applied.

summary.span: 按指定的顺序，将指定的切变向量应用到此 。

span.span: Applies the specified shear vector to this in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法中应用的转换是纯切变，仅当其中一个参数为 0。The transformation applied in this method is a pure shear only if one of the parameters is 0. 应用于原点，矩形时`shearY`因子为 0 时，转换将通过水平移动的下边缘`shearX`倍的矩形的高度。Applied to a rectangle at the origin, when the `shearY` factor is 0, the transformation moves the bottom edge horizontally by `shearX` times the height of the rectangle. 当`shearX`身份为 0，则它将移动右边缘的垂直`shearY`倍的矩形的宽度。When the `shearX` factor is 0, it moves the right edge vertically by `shearY` times the width of the rectangle. 当两个参数都为非零，因为结果难以预测时，警告是按顺序。Caution is in order when both parameters are nonzero, because the results are hard to predict. 例如，如果这两个因素都是 1，将转换为单数形式 (因此不可逆)，将为单个行的整个平面挤压。For example, if both factors are 1, the transformation is singular (hence noninvertible), squeezing the entire plane to a single line. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建构成一个矩形的点数组。Creates an array of points that form a rectangle. - 将此数组的点绘制 （到在应用缩放转换 （蓝色矩形） 之前的屏幕。Draws this array of points (to the screen prior to applying a scaling transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵并增加 3 沿 x 轴和 y 轴中的 2。Creates a matrix and scales it by 3 in the x-axis and 2 in the y-axis. - 为点数组应用此矩阵转换。Applies this matrix transform to the array of points. - 将转换后的数组绘制到屏幕 （红色矩形）。Draws the transformed array to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意，红色矩形在原来的 3 x 轴和 y 轴，包括矩形 （矩形的起始点） 的左上角中的 2 已调整大小。Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of 3 in the x-axis and by 2 in the y-axis, including the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the beginning point of the rectangle). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建构成一个矩形的点数组。Creates an array of points that form a rectangle. - 在应用缩放转换 （蓝色矩形） 之前在屏幕上绘制点数组。Draws this array of points to the screen prior to applying a scaling transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵和增加 3 沿 x 轴和 y 轴，在 2 并将其转换在两个轴的 100。Creates a matrix and scales it by 3 in the x-axis and 2 in the y-axis, and translates it by 100 in both axes. - 列出了在屏幕上的矩阵元素。Lists the matrix elements to the screen. - 为点数组应用此矩阵转换。Applies this matrix transform to the array of points. - 将转换后的数组绘制到屏幕 （红色矩形）。Draws the transformed array to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意，红色矩形已放大因子为 3 x 轴和 y 轴，包括矩形 （矩形的起始点） 的左上角中的 2，但忽略的转换向量 （矩阵中的最后两个元素）。Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of 3 in the x-axis and by 2 in the y-axis, including the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the beginning point of the rectangle) but the translation vector (the last two elements of the matrix) is ignored. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#8)]

span.span: A that specifies the order (append or prepend) in which the translation is applied to this .

summary.span: 按指定的顺序，将指定的转换向量应用到此 。

span.span: Applies the specified translation vector to this in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 在应用转换变换 （蓝色矩形） 之前在屏幕上绘制一个矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a translate transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵，并将其转换在两个轴的 100。Creates a matrix and translates it by 100 in both axes. - 向该矩形适用此矩阵转换Applies this matrix transform to the rectangle, - 将已转换的矩形绘制到屏幕 （红色矩形）。Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意红色矩形的开头是所在的 100 个点在从一开始两个轴的蓝色三角形。Notice that the beginning of the red rectangle is located 100 points in both axes from the beginning of the blue triangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VectorTransformPoints(valuetype System.Drawing.Point[] pts) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: pts
param.span: 一个 结构的数组，它表示要转换的点。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the points to transform.

summary.span: 将数组中的每个矢量与矩阵相乘。

span.span: Multiplies each vector in an array by the matrix.

summary.span: 该矩阵的转换元素（第三行）被忽略。

span.span: The translation elements of this matrix (third row) are ignored.
